subject: docs: refine tool goals with clearer user-focused language
body:
- Update System Purpose section in CLAUDE.md with goal table
- Add "What It Helps You Answer" section to BUSINESS_GUIDE.md
- Remove legacy "common ownership" framing from financial_models doc
- Define "best deal" across 5 dimensions (financial, tax, accounting, compliance, long-term)
- Add Recommendation Summary feature idea to TODO.md

Mode 1 goal: "Find the price range where you hit your margin AND your client sees clear ROI"
Mode 2 goal: "Compare structures to find the best deal for both you and your client"
